value:
There's something odd about you...
But I know you're a good person.
Dragons like me can sense as much.

My sister and I are on a journey
to our homeland. It's been long
and hard—and it's not over yet.

Feeling weak and weary? We can take
a break! I can play a little tune on my
flute... That'd cheer you up for sure!

I hear there's a hall around here just
for singing and dancing! Would you
mind...showing me the way?

I can hear the wind's voice in this
place... It's quite comforting, actually.
Makes me wish I could stay forever...

Hello there, I'm Nils. I'm a bard!
I'm staying over at your friend
$Nf's castle!

Everything feels...more alive,
somehow! Like I could put on
the performance of a lifetime!
Whew! What a refreshing breeze!

I wonder... Has the air of this world
changed from what it once was?
...Has it changed too much?

Thank you! I'll make sure to work
hard and use this to keep everyone's
spirits up!

Hello. I'm Nils. Nice to meet you!
See this flute? With this, I'll give
everyone whatever support I can!

Hey, there's something I think you
should know... I'm really happy you
summoned me!$k$pIt's great to share a world with
humans again, even if Ninian and
I have seen them at their worst...$k$pI grew to really enjoy living in the
human world—but in the end, I had
to leave. For their sake...$k$pWe dragons are not sustained by the
same nourishment as you humans...
So, eventually, I must leave you too.$k$pUntil that day, though...I'll pour my
heart into playing my flute! I hope I'll
see you striving for success as well.
それっ
えーい！
わっ…
痛いよ…！
I won't run away anymore!
I'll do Ninian's part, too!
We'll change the course of fate!
I'll do my best!
I'm done for...
Heehee...
I can keep going!
One more time!
I'm Nils. My sister Ninian and I are traveling performers.

My opinion of humans has changed since meeting all of you.
I hope we'll find a way to live together in peace someday.
It's Ninian's wish that I stand by Lord Eliwood.
I hear a familiar voice calling out from the Dragon's Gate. Could it be...
Even if we're apart -- if we never see each other again -- our bond will never, ever be cut.
OK!
What do you need?
I can do this!
